summary: This document is a TECS (Treasury Enforcement Communications System) query record showing that Jeffrey Epstein's name was accessed in a Person Lookout Query at Newark International Airport Terminal C on April 28, 2019. It indicates law enforcement monitoring of Epstein's travel or presence at the airport.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of a Person Lookout Query accessed at Newark International Airport Terminal C by a TASPD (likely Transportation Security Administration Personnel or similar) requestor.

events.title: Epstein Lookup at Newark Airport
events.description: A Person Lookout Query for Jeffrey Epstein was accessed by a TASPD requestor at Newark International Airport Terminal C.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was the subject of a law enforcement Person Lookout Query accessed on April 28, 2019.
The query was accessed at Newark International Airport Terminal C, suggesting monitoring related to travel.
The accessing entity is listed as TASPD, likely a transportation security or law enforcement agency.
